SELECT u.NAME as name, u.PASSWORD as password, u.USER_ID as userId, u.USER_NAME as userName, u.FIRM_OFFER_ACCOUNT as firmOfferAccount, u.REGIST_TIME as registTime, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME as lastLoginTime FROM "USER" u WHERE USER_NAME=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT u.USER_ID as userId, u.USER_NAME as userName FROM "USER" u WHERE EXISTS( select ur.USERID from "USERROLE" ur where u.USER_ID =ur.USERID and ur.ROLEID=1)

SELECT distinct
FROM "USER" t,USERROLE t1 where t.USER_ID = t1.USERID and t1.ROLEID != 5
AND t.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{userName},'%'))
ORDER BY t.regist_time DESC

SELECT , t2.LEVEL_NAME as levelName FROM "USER" t,USERROLE t1,MEMBER_LEVEL t2 where t.USER_ID = t1.USERID and t1.ROLEID = 5 and t.LEVEL_ID = t2."ID"
AND t.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{userName},'%'))
ORDER BY t.regist_time DESC
